text: Mariano Rumor (; 16 June 1915 – 22 January 1990) was an Italian politician. He was a member of the Christian Democracy (DC). He was the 39th Prime Minister of Italy from December 1968 to August 1970 and again from July 1973 to November 1974.Scheda di attività di Mariano Rumor, Senato della Repubblica Rumor also was Minister of Agriculture from 1959 to 1963, Minister of Foreign Affairs from 1974 to 1976 and Minister of the Interior in two brief times, in 1963 and from 1972 to 1973. Rumor was also Secretary of the Christian Democracy from 1964 to 1969.Mariano Rumor – Biografia, Storiologia ==References== Category:1915 births Category:1990 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Italy Category:Politicians from Veneto Category:People from Vicenza
title: Mariano Rumor
